item.title: latex 測試
item.description: display inline \( x^n+y^n=z^n \) display block $$ x^n+y^n=z^n $$ display inline \( \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} q\sum_{n=5}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 \) display block $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} q\sum_{n=5}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$
